forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers and windy conditions developing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
